statements: UPDATE virtual_classroom_resources SET resource_name='Introduction to Python', resource_description='Learn the basics of Python' WHERE resource_id=1;
UPDATE virtual_classroom_resources SET resource_type='Video', resource_link='https://example.com/python-tutorial' WHERE resource_id=2;

UPDATE virtual_classroom_resources SET resource_name='Introduction to Programming', resource_type='Video Tutorial', resource_description='A comprehensive guide on programming basics.', resource_link='https://www.example.com/video1' WHERE resource_id=1;

UPDATE virtual_classroom_resources SET resource_description='Interactive lessons on advanced algorithms.', resource_name='Advanced Algorithms', resource_link='https://www.example.com/lesson2', resource_type='Interactive Lesson' WHERE resource_id=2;
UPDATE reference_materials SET material_name = 'Updated Material Name', author = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE external_links SET link_title = 'New Link Title', category = 'Tech' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE reference_materials SET material_name='New Book Name', author='New Author Name' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE external_links SET link_url='https://www.updatedlink.com', category='General' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE materials SET content = 'New content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE external_links SET title = 'Updated Title', url = 'https://updated_url.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE materials SET title='New Title', content='Updated content' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE resources SET type='New Type', description='Updated description' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE reference_materials SET author='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE external_links SET title='New Link Title', description='Updated URL Description' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE reference_materials SET author='John Doe', category='Science' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE virtual_classroom_resource SET resource_name = 'New Resource Name' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE reference_material SET material_content = 'Updated Material Content', material_type = 'Article' WHERE material_id = 2;

UPDATE resource_mapping SET category_id = 3 WHERE mapping_id = 5;
